alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 12 at 7:50PM MST until September 12 at 8:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 830 PM MST. * At 749 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Metro Center, or near Glendale, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Scottsdale, Peoria, Paradise Valley, Sun City, New River, Cave Creek, Carefree, Piestewa Peak Park, Deer Valley Airport, North Mountain Park, Arizona State Fairgrounds, and This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 140 and 143. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 201 and 224. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
